directions: Place the yogurt, mayonnaise, sour cream, green onions, and bacon bits in a mixing bowl. Season with parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, horseradish, basil, thyme, pepper, paprika, chili powder, sea salt, and dill. Mix until evenly blended. Cover, and chill several hours to allow the flavors to meld.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: No-Guilt Zesty Ranch Dip
